skins.shipDescription: Casablanca-class escort carrier C Casablanca, Hull Number CVE-55.
skins.selfIntroduction: Back then, roughly fifty other Casablanca-class sisters entered service over the course of just over a year. Although most of us saw our missions come to an end shortly after the war, I will do my best to fulfill my duties to this fleet, whether as an escort, air support, or a transport. It's a pleasure to work with you, Commander.
skins.acquisition: Good morning to you. Escort carrier Casablanca, reporting in. I shall support the fleet to the best of my abilities, so you may rest assured.
skins.login: Time is of the essence. Let us quickly begin the day's work.
skins.details: Although fighting on the front lines is not my specialty, I'll give it my all if needed!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, shall I help assess the state of the fleet's logistics?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, where would you rather be, the thrilling, constantly-shifting front lines, or the humble, but critically important rear lines?
skins.secretaryIdle3: If possible, I'd like to hear about what happened at the Battle of Casablanca from Massachusetts.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, what's the matter... Oh, is my necktie crooked?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek?! I... I've never read about stuff like this in my books before...!

skins.shipDescription: Phew... Can't train hard if you don't stay hydrated! Oh, Commander, good day! Did you come to watch us practice?
skins.acquisition: Phew... Can't train hard if you don't stay hydrated! Oh, Commander, good day! Did you come to watch us practice?
skins.login: Cheerleaders raise the morale of the players. It doesn't seem much different from the role of an escort carrier, supporting those who are working hard on the battlefield.
skins.details: Getting the choreography down isn't the hard part. It's being able to cheer so enthusiastically like Reno... It's a bit too embarrassing if you ask me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Captain Reno, I think your enthusiasm is nothing but commendable, but wouldn't it be better to take a break now to conserve our energy?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I brought some water and sports drinks. Feel free to take whatever you want.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even though this squad was thrown together last minute, thanks to the support of you and Craven, I don't want to lose to the other factions!
skins.secretaryTouch: Is this towel for me? Ah, thank you very much, Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, you seem to be quite good at taking advantage of these situations...
